009f05fd-f5a1-4a23-ae72-df2796aed91d.name: Ion Cannon Turret
009f05fd-f5a1-4a23-ae72-df2796aed91d.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

0aecc53e-daa9-4a1a-b3bb-bd488083db0a.name: Proton Torpedoes
0aecc53e-daa9-4a1a-b3bb-bd488083db0a.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change 1 of your results to a result.

f3bd6c8c-ed19-4998-b693-cb7713496d0e.name: R2 Astromech
f3bd6c8c-ed19-4998-b693-cb7713496d0e.text: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

126b4476-a280-4b56-b119-521200a02191.name: R2-D2
126b4476-a280-4b56-b119-521200a02191.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

9469507f-27f2-4210-85e4-d75bb4f38ad0.name: R2-F2
9469507f-27f2-4210-85e4-d75bb4f38ad0.text: Action: Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.

3f17a621-3d30-45d7-85ce-c40c663a6de7.name: R5-D8
3f17a621-3d30-45d7-85ce-c40c663a6de7.text:
Action: Roll 1 defense die.

On a or result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.

b54d8471-5f23-4a85-8cef-7b66e7bb7f29.name: R5-K6
b54d8471-5f23-4a85-8cef-7b66e7bb7f29.text:
After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die.

On a result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship. You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.

46a3f017-685f-4448-91bc-21dcd058f468.name: R5 Astromech
46a3f017-685f-4448-91bc-21dcd058f468.text: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.

847b1e9d-b796-4397-95bb-081425b4cd6a.name: Determination
847b1e9d-b796-4397-95bb-081425b4cd6a.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.

a514e6e1-1468-4c3f-a5a6-b0fea5f32767.name: Swarm Tactics
a514e6e1-1468-4c3f-a5a6-b0fea5f32767.text:
At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1.

Until the end of this phase, treat the chosen ship as if its pilot skill were equal to your pilot skill.

1923dbfd-82fb-4eeb-8f26-90fd80c0e7dc.name: Squad Leader
1923dbfd-82fb-4eeb-8f26-90fd80c0e7dc.text:
Action: Choose 1 ship at Range 1-2 that has a lower pilot skill than you.

The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.

a9210432-79b0-4979-976f-8b12859140b2.name: Expert Handling
a9210432-79b0-4979-976f-8b12859140b2.text:
Action: Perform a free barrel roll action. If you do not have the action icon, receive 1 stress token.

You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

374c21bc-aee0-492b-af45-44cd7ddfe0da.name: Marksmanship
374c21bc-aee0-492b-af45-44cd7ddfe0da.text: Action: When attacking this round, you may change 1 of your results to a result and all of your other results to results.

3b1befea-38ca-4562-beaf-f7a7cddf9d87.name: Concussion Missiles
3b1befea-38ca-4562-beaf-f7a7cddf9d87.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change 1 of your blank results to a result.

4493828f-2b35-4c8f-a1a8-d70aee54dae6.name: Cluster Missiles
4493828f-2b35-4c8f-a1a8-d70aee54dae6.text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice.

fb85ec38-0647-4d31-96de-c273bdfa1193.name: Daredevil
fb85ec38-0647-4d31-96de-c273bdfa1193.text:
Action: Execute a white ( 1) or ( 1) maneuver. Then, receive 1 stress token.

Then, if you do not have the action icon, roll 2 attack dice. Suffer any damage () and any critical damage () rolled.

29da50e2-1e9c-4023-b938-fd4ab06cdf13.name: Elusiveness
29da50e2-1e9c-4023-b938-fd4ab06cdf13.text:
When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die.

If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.

d9cc507b-215c-4b01-a22c-5f2aba90e3f6.name: Homing Missiles
d9cc507b-215c-4b01-a22c-5f2aba90e3f6.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack.

75ab5287-fc63-4199-9fb6-5592925bf77d.name: Push the Limit
75ab5287-fc63-4199-9fb6-5592925bf77d.text:
Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar.

Then receive 1 stress token.

18063710-f693-4b01-ac73-2ba3726916ba.name: Deadeye
18063710-f693-4b01-ac73-2ba3726916ba.text:
You may treat the Attack (target lock): header as Attack (focus):.

When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.

1ae87fff-d10e-4c0a-806d-217e5f9e1e83.name: Expose
1ae87fff-d10e-4c0a-806d-217e5f9e1e83.text: Action: Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.

227fecf4-aac7-40e2-901c-5c7bb8936e09.name: Gunner
227fecf4-aac7-40e2-901c-5c7bb8936e09.text: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack.  You cannot perform another attack this round.

d073a215-f775-4a1b-bc1b-f66410f32b79.name: Ion Cannon
d073a215-f775-4a1b-bc1b-f66410f32b79.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

5cfe0cb1-5cf8-4b4a-8441-7f650b4c8a15.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
5cfe0cb1-5cf8-4b4a-8441-7f650b4c8a15.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all of your results to results.

33c45f30-9c22-46c2-b16b-64f68aac7024.name: Seismic Charges
33c45f30-9c22-46c2-b16b-64f68aac7024.text:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

Seismic Charge Token: When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token suffers 1 damage. Then discard this token.

dd57d73c-acd8-4b8b-ba0b-1600acaec9c8.name: Mercenary Copilot
dd57d73c-acd8-4b8b-ba0b-1600acaec9c8.text: When attacking at Range 3, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

0e61c0f7-197d-49a3-aad3-253690f0acd8.name: Assault Missiles
0e61c0f7-197d-49a3-aad3-253690f0acd8.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, each other ship at Range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

61f0762c-78d0-4a98-9914-d1014d4ab40e.name: Veteran Instincts
61f0762c-78d0-4a98-9914-d1014d4ab40e.text: Increase your pilot skill value by 2.

837bbe46-7975-461a-9d12-2e6419c30603.name: Proximity Mines
837bbe46-7975-461a-9d12-2e6419c30603.text:
Action: Discard this card to drop 1 proximity mine token.

When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates.

Proximity Mine Token: When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 3 attack dice and suffers all damage () and critical damage () rolled. Then discard this token.

15cf846c-3e5d-4100-a7ff-6acb2f972203.name: Weapons Engineer
15cf846c-3e5d-4100-a7ff-6acb2f972203.text:
You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship).

When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 different ships.

0b7b870b-411e-4f75-9f99-20f95c8d552c.name: Draw Their Fire
0b7b870b-411e-4f75-9f99-20f95c8d552c.text: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncanceled results instead of the target ship.

6b8731ad-b46f-40cc-a995-d04540d75376.name: Luke Skywalker
6b8731ad-b46f-40cc-a995-d04540d75376.text:
Rebel only.

After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 result to a result. You cannot perform another attack this round.

338e557f-ce60-47a8-82e3-92704c09b58d.name: Nien Nunb
338e557f-ce60-47a8-82e3-92704c09b58d.text:
Rebel only.

You may treat all maneuvers as green maneuvers.

cdf572f9-563c-4d17-9103-fc207b78b584.name: Chewbacca
cdf572f9-563c-4d17-9103-fc207b78b584.text:
Rebel only.

When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield.

Then, discard this Upgrade card.

9280f483-f474-446a-af88-f1212d4551a6.name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
9280f483-f474-446a-af88-f1212d4551a6.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change up to 3 of your blank results to results.

66538523-b4a4-412d-bd89-37845b7deda6.name: Autoblaster
66538523-b4a4-412d-bd89-37845b7deda6.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

Your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

The defender may cancel results before results.

8c147941-4b3c-46f4-8be1-dca94ee7507c.name: Fire-Control System
8c147941-4b3c-46f4-8be1-dca94ee7507c.text: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

aec6227d-b78a-4065-b9fa-ab0930929d44.name: Blaster Turret
aec6227d-b78a-4065-b9fa-ab0930929d44.text: Attack (focus): Spend 1 focus token to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

9602eb9a-12f4-4a53-96db-7c0c9b00cd2a.name: Recon Specialist
9602eb9a-12f4-4a53-96db-7c0c9b00cd2a.text: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

24f368b3-03f8-4259-9416-111fd2e34b6a.name: Saboteur
24f368b3-03f8-4259-9416-111fd2e34b6a.text: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a or result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

88edb48a-e445-4db0-b051-3c4a2cba2402.name: Intelligence Agent
88edb48a-e445-4db0-b051-3c4a2cba2402.text: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2.  You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.

1befeb9a-4dde-4a51-ab37-2bd3a53523cd.name: Proton Bombs
1befeb9a-4dde-4a51-ab37-2bd3a53523cd.text:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 proton bomb token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

Proton Bomb Token: When this bomb token detonates, deal 1 faceup Damage card to each ship at Range 1 of the token. Then discard this token.

c582fced-7e2d-438e-a4ba-44aef319ca30.name: Adrenaline Rush
c582fced-7e2d-438e-a4ba-44aef319ca30.text: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.

f80d91d8-76d9-4ad7-90a6-7d5371fa9490.name: Advanced Sensors
f80d91d8-76d9-4ad7-90a6-7d5371fa9490.text:
Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action.

If you use this ability, you must skip your "Perform Action" step during this round.

57da9528-60e8-4811-9b9d-a3b33763d3cf.name: Sensor Jammer
57da9528-60e8-4811-9b9d-a3b33763d3cf.text:
When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's results into a result.

The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.

1c8b271d-ccd6-4e6d-9dfa-a0261c2765e7.name: Darth Vader
1c8b271d-ccd6-4e6d-9dfa-a0261c2765e7.text:
Imperial only.

After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 critical damage.

26dad2fa-4e98-4456-b16b-b00cedb59f6b.name: Rebel Captive
26dad2fa-4e98-4456-b16b-b00cedb59f6b.text:
Imperial only.

Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.

278e21d9-0392-4495-a6e5-d3bd44e4c5d5.name: Flight Instructor
278e21d9-0392-4495-a6e5-d3bd44e4c5d5.text: When defending, you may reroll 1 of your results. If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

c9229b75-2b8a-4ab0-86c9-2a1c15d11123.name: Navigator
c9229b75-2b8a-4ab0-86c9-2a1c15d11123.text:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing.

You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.

d64446d9-5681-4f94-9341-ea8cc153b027.name: Opportunist
d64446d9-5681-4f94-9341-ea8cc153b027.text:
When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.

897e9058-9aa1-408e-b5ff-316dc47937da.name: Comms Booster
897e9058-9aa1-408e-b5ff-316dc47937da.text: Energy: Spend 1 energy to remove all stress tokens from a friendly ship at Range 1-3. Then assign 1 focus token to that ship.

1610e8f9-2dbf-4639-bb8e-8f3721043d50.name: Slicer Tools
1610e8f9-2dbf-4639-bb8e-8f3721043d50.text: Action: Choose 1 or more ships at Range 1-3 that have a stress token. For each ship chosen, you may spend 1 energy to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

b255734f-7499-47ad-948b-c58e05186292.name: Shield Projector
b255734f-7499-47ad-948b-c58e05186292.text: When an enemy ship is declaring either a small or large ship as the target of its attack, you may spend 3 energy to force that ship to target you if possible.

95d81253-1daf-4ceb-bf3f-de7b03d60ea1.name: Ion Pulse Missiles
95d81253-1daf-4ceb-bf3f-de7b03d60ea1.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens. Then cancel all dice results.

94c4366c-6b26-4a33-9c97-081357a6cb9d.name: Wingman
94c4366c-6b26-4a33-9c97-081357a6cb9d.text: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.

3eff0409-6ff1-47cc-a3b1-0b345884fa2a.name: Decoy
3eff0409-6ff1-47cc-a3b1-0b345884fa2a.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2.  Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.

e52a95e4-e863-4353-b632-d3a7b7fa7fa3.name: Outmaneuver
e52a95e4-e863-4353-b632-d3a7b7fa7fa3.text: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc, reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

9c11f2cc-ea68-4f9f-9f08-8265e5125bef.name: Predator
9c11f2cc-ea68-4f9f-9f08-8265e5125bef.text: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.  If the defender's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

b170b7fc-88b6-4f31-b3ed-3564ab09254a.name: Flechette Torpedoes
b170b7fc-88b6-4f31-b3ed-3564ab09254a.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack.

After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or lower.

d3755ba3-8e62-4469-9eff-9bde90733fe2.name: R7 Astromech
d3755ba3-8e62-4469-9eff-9bde90733fe2.text: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice.  The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.

a69eaad5-ad78-4a8c-9ad2-4af4a089fab7.name: R7-T1
a69eaad5-ad78-4a8c-9ad2-4af4a089fab7.text: Action: Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship. Then, you may perform a free boost action.

3ff043d9-7890-4c09-98e7-fb516ada8295.name: Tactician
3ff043d9-7890-4c09-98e7-fb516ada8295.text: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.

6c5a9ba8-cec7-4865-8ea7-5a570ab14f73.name: R2-D2 (Crew)
6c5a9ba8-cec7-4865-8ea7-5a570ab14f73.text:
Rebel only.

At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die. On a result, randomly flip 1 of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

82cd03a0-928a-464a-8b8d-63540d32aa3c.name: C-3PO
82cd03a0-928a-464a-8b8d-63540d32aa3c.text:
Rebel only.

Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of results. If you roll that many results (before modifying dice), add 1 result.

86b7db20-bcd5-435c-bea6-da03fb584f29.name: Single Turbolasers
86b7db20-bcd5-435c-bea6-da03fb584f29.text: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. The defender doubles his agility value against this attack. You may change 1 of your results to a result.

8ad0cbc4-e6eb-4dfa-864c-dde55237523c.name: Quad Laser Cannons
8ad0cbc4-e6eb-4dfa-864c-dde55237523c.text: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack does not hit, you may immediately spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack again.

ac94fecc-d356-443e-934f-2b21b79d2d88.name: Tibanna Gas Supplies
ac94fecc-d356-443e-934f-2b21b79d2d88.text: Energy: You may discard this card to gain 3 energy.

71cdfeb4-b34a-4299-bc1b-160f1a858629.name: Ionization Reactor
71cdfeb4-b34a-4299-bc1b-160f1a858629.text: Energy: Spend 5 energy from this card and discard this card to cause each other ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage and receive 1 ion token.

cb7a47a5-1801-4aea-99ad-3376701b8d42.name: Engine Booster
cb7a47a5-1801-4aea-99ad-3376701b8d42.text: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver dial, you may spend 1 energy to execute a white ( 1) maneuver. You cannot use this ability if you would overlap another ship.

5bdf6750-5e7e-4225-8e73-f6a2f150d538.name: R3-A2
5bdf6750-5e7e-4225-8e73-f6a2f150d538.text: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.

20d37a0d-bb00-4668-8c86-a2e25de98c59.name: R2-D6
20d37a0d-bb00-4668-8c86-a2e25de98c59.text:
Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have a upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.

f50edd5c-a1d3-4c06-a080-02afd7720247.name: Enhanced Scopes
f50edd5c-a1d3-4c06-a080-02afd7720247.text: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill value as "0".

20adcff6-ec38-4b8e-8b27-efe4b13041a1.name: Chardaan Refit
20adcff6-ec38-4b8e-8b27-efe4b13041a1.text:
A-Wing only.

This card has a negative squad point cost.

340855ab-d43c-4704-8727-2aa981c2d9b9.name: Proton Rockets
340855ab-d43c-4704-8727-2aa981c2d9b9.text:
Attack (Focus): Discard this card to perform this attack.

You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice.

37859a0c-14c9-4824-8ab4-7cf34a5890ed.name: Kyle Katarn
37859a0c-14c9-4824-8ab4-7cf34a5890ed.text:
Rebel only.

After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

c384fb9c-9c0b-4874-843b-203a979f086d.name: Jan Ors
c384fb9c-9c0b-4874-843b-203a979f086d.text:
Rebel only.

Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign it an evade token instead.

74a318d8-9bb0-4402-b844-7011bf6cac58.name: Toryn Farr
74a318d8-9bb0-4402-b844-7011bf6cac58.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range 1-2. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.

93a840e7-f06d-4db9-b95f-1cb47875ba54.name: R4-D6
93a840e7-f06d-4db9-b95f-1cb47875ba54.text: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncanceled results, you may choose to cancel those results until there are 2 remaining. For each result canceled this way, receive 1 stress token.

ea4cecbe-1e30-484f-ae45-2595ebb0fdae.name: R5-P9
ea4cecbe-1e30-484f-ae45-2595ebb0fdae.text: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

9a833544-ec19-4eaa-9314-37fa080fd538.name: WED-15 Repair Droid
9a833544-ec19-4eaa-9314-37fa080fd538.text:
Huge Ship only.

Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.

610032b1-9d0b-4a5a-adfe-f45c47f8f287.name: Carlist Rieekan
610032b1-9d0b-4a5a-adfe-f45c47f8f287.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.

6564f0ed-bcb5-44a6-91d7-a0423a23f312.name: Jan Dodonna
6564f0ed-bcb5-44a6-91d7-a0423a23f312.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its results to a .

b45122e2-2424-4921-aca4-a2ade0f3ea09.name: Expanded Cargo Hold
b45122e2-2424-4921-aca4-a2ade0f3ea09.text:
GR-75 only.

Once per round, when you would be dealt a faceup Damage card, you may draw that card from either the fore or aft Damage deck.

4f617d5a-0df5-4d1d-ab56-ccb287a7d4f6.name: Backup Shield Generator
4f617d5a-0df5-4d1d-ab56-ccb287a7d4f6.text: At the end of each round, you may spend 1 energy to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

c58618ab-15dc-490d-a3cd-a17ec5f9fbfa.name: EM Emitter
c58618ab-15dc-490d-a3cd-a17ec5f9fbfa.text: When you obstruct an attack, the defender rolls 3 additional defense dice (instead of 1).

5eb47f50-de34-456b-8b5b-fde9b3c04269.name: Frequency Jammer
5eb47f50-de34-456b-8b5b-fde9b3c04269.text: When you perform a jam action, choose 1 enemy ship that does not have a stress token and is at Range 1 of the jammed ship.  The chosen ship receives 1 stress token.

3e9d1a79-4ecd-411c-a91c-7b0d2d522c07.name: Han Solo
3e9d1a79-4ecd-411c-a91c-7b0d2d522c07.text:
Rebel only.

When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all of your results to results.

4a89a98e-9e06-4f8c-aaf2-1da9f3ebaeed.name: Leia Organa
4a89a98e-9e06-4f8c-aaf2-1da9f3ebaeed.text:
Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red maneuver to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the phase.

6403f93e-1b34-4d72-9af2-49686f28d87d.name: Targeting Coordinator
6403f93e-1b34-4d72-9af2-49686f28d87d.text: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

abf52d6a-0cac-439f-a377-d107aefd4407.name: Raymus Antilles
abf52d6a-0cac-439f-a377-d107aefd4407.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-3. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver. If the maneuver is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.

d4d49014-58ec-44ea-8181-e09dd8fa3bf0.name: Gunnery Team
d4d49014-58ec-44ea-8181-e09dd8fa3bf0.text: Once per round, when attacking with a secondary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to change 1 of your blank results to a result.

0819d291-8ed3-425b-a33b-35e00c43ccef.name: Sensor Team
0819d291-8ed3-425b-a33b-35e00c43ccef.text: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-5 instead of 1-3.

c49a5a87-5111-4c1a-88d7-de13efe4307d.name: Engineering Team
c49a5a87-5111-4c1a-88d7-de13efe4307d.text: During the Activation phase, when you reveal a maneuver, gain 1 additional energy during the "Gain Energy" step.

9b502b41-3c2e-4fba-9323-c5fc9fa72c2d.name: Lando Calrissian
9b502b41-3c2e-4fba-9323-c5fc9fa72c2d.text:
Rebel only.

Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

8efc59eb-860d-4a1a-bfb9-9cf582bf3a71.name: Mara Jade
8efc59eb-860d-4a1a-bfb9-9cf582bf3a71.text:
Imperial only.

At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.

849fad7a-3cd8-4ad3-b9a5-1154fefd3497.name: Fleet Officer
849fad7a-3cd8-4ad3-b9a5-1154fefd3497.text:
Imperial only.

Action: Choose up to 2 friendly ships within Range 1-2 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships. Then receive 1 stress token.

fd80bf85-4ea0-44c8-bcb4-190b0fe822ae.name: Stay On Target
fd80bf85-4ea0-44c8-bcb4-190b0fe822ae.text:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same speed.

Treat that maneuver as a red maneuver.

39ae4ce4-0de0-48ce-9c24-c3b0be560cf7.name: Dash Rendar
39ae4ce4-0de0-48ce-9c24-c3b0be560cf7.text:
Rebel only.

You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle.

Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

19fb058a-2044-47d6-8243-faea2589cfbf.name: Lone Wolf
19fb058a-2044-47d6-8243-faea2589cfbf.text: When attacking or defending, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, you may reroll 1 of your blank results.

0ab9a3bf-c060-46ae-b692-f3577e8a46e6.name: "Leebo"
0ab9a3bf-c060-46ae-b692-f3577e8a46e6.text:
Rebel only.

Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.

ad5531aa-e519-45da-b263-6cd177b59611.name: Ruthlessness
ad5531aa-e519-45da-b263-6cd177b59611.text:
Imperial only.

After you perform an attack that hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself). That ship suffers 1 damage.

5979d776-5461-4831-9b3d-a246c1f6b667.name: Intimidation
5979d776-5461-4831-9b3d-a246c1f6b667.text: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.

5611edbc-683e-4e1b-9d3b-0b6469abebd7.name: Ysanne Isard
5611edbc-683e-4e1b-9d3b-0b6469abebd7.text:
Imperial only.

At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.

3f766929-1fea-4454-b9a9-bb298ca23e4e.name: Moff Jerjerrod
3f766929-1fea-4454-b9a9-bb298ca23e4e.text:
Imperial only.

When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this Upgrade card or another Upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect).

e2deeeac-2cc0-45f9-b439-17b9c7995720.name: Ion Torpedoes
e2deeeac-2cc0-45f9-b439-17b9c7995720.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token.

89adeb28-eb34-4018-b6db-bee6cfd05be4.name: Bodyguard
89adeb28-eb34-4018-b6db-bee6cfd05be4.text:
Scum only.

At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.

1bd22fd8-7ba4-41c5-b2e5-d2f064424f22.name: Calc???
1bd22fd8-7ba4-41c5-b2e5-d2f064424f22.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

816ed743-4fb1-46e1-b5fa-8d8b35d47752.name: Accuracy Corrector
816ed743-4fb1-46e1-b5fa-8d8b35d47752.text:
When attacking, you may cancel all dice results. Then, you may add 2 results.

Your dice cannot be modified again during this attack.

2ef92b8d-b9b1-4ee9-8066-ebd5b8b2efed.name: Inertial Dampeners
2ef92b8d-b9b1-4ee9-8066-ebd5b8b2efed.text: When you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to instead perform a white [0] maneuver. Then receive 1 stress token.

5fcb1aa2-5434-42be-b14f-f35db5b596e9.name: Flechette Cannon
5fcb1aa2-5434-42be-b14f-f35db5b596e9.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results.

f364f9ac-3db4-45bd-a2ec-c8d4510ebfef.name: "Mangler" Cannon
f364f9ac-3db4-45bd-a2ec-c8d4510ebfef.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

When attacking, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

1372a0c6-8172-402c-aec3-2821f1dbc3fc.name: Dead Man's Switch
1372a0c6-8172-402c-aec3-2821f1dbc3fc.text: When you are destroyed, each ship at Range 1 suffers 1 damage.

be7d4245-b60c-472d-96bc-f412c1bdfa28.name: Feedback Array
be7d4245-b60c-472d-96bc-f412c1bdfa28.text: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may receive 1 ion token and suffer 1 damage to choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1.  That ship suffers 1 damage.

e8626bb9-f7d0-4870-81f4-2dbb4e21f252.name: "Hot Shot" Blaster
e8626bb9-f7d0-4870-81f4-2dbb4e21f252.text: Attack: Discard this card to attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

3b5b3c7f-07ab-449c-8102-feba5af98d02.name: Greedo
3b5b3c7f-07ab-449c-8102-feba5af98d02.text:
Scum only.

The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.

4903d173-8335-4310-a4aa-08db63de87c5.name: Salvaged Astromech
4903d173-8335-4310-a4aa-08db63de87c5.text:
When you are dealt a Damage card with the Ship trait, you may immediately discard that card (before resolving its effect).

Then, discard this Upgrade card.

14409e2a-4eb0-4872-b39e-92070a63b442.name: Bomb Loadout
14409e2a-4eb0-4872-b39e-92070a63b442.text:
Y-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains the icon.

325e664d-729b-4f33-b7f9-96d578a8e1b3.name: "Genius"
325e664d-729b-4f33-b7f9-96d578a8e1b3.text: If you are equipped with a bomb that can be dropped before you reveal your maneuver, you may drop the bomb after you execute your maneuver instead.

2b79e6e9-6498-4ed4-995b-a9e1c732eff4.name: Unhinged Astromech
2b79e6e9-6498-4ed4-995b-a9e1c732eff4.text: You may treat all 3-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

4d24e217-df86-4676-aa7a-6cd2588d29fd.name: R4-B11
4d24e217-df86-4676-aa7a-6cd2588d29fd.text: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all defense dice. The defender must reroll the chosen dice.

eedd12fc-5640-4c30-8734-6dbd7fa538f1.name: Autoblaster Turret
eedd12fc-5640-4c30-8734-6dbd7fa538f1.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

Your results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel results before results.

7553e596-7789-4eab-9811-946e35ed25f4.name: R4 Agromech
7553e596-7789-4eab-9811-946e35ed25f4.text: When attacking, after you spend a focus token, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

791c194e-1601-437b-b4d4-432c48ac251f.name: K4 Security Droid
791c194e-1601-437b-b4d4-432c48ac251f.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

15abddf8-3b0a-4210-936e-01ce6693f82c.name: Outlaw Tech
15abddf8-3b0a-4210-936e-01ce6693f82c.text: After you execute a red maneuver, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

9a4b96a6-3191-4220-bdbe-d1058c8fb9a8.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
9a4b96a6-3191-4220-bdbe-d1058c8fb9a8.text:
TIE Advanced only.

When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 result to your roll. If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.

33b5bbf8-407a-4640-b7d2-082b66c8d840.name: Ion Cannon Battery
33b5bbf8-407a-4640-b7d2-082b66c8d840.text: Attack (energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 critical damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

162fbcc3-1299-436a-a12d-48d74ba369d7.name: Stealth Device
162fbcc3-1299-436a-a12d-48d74ba369d7.text: Increase your agility value by 1.  If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.

6d937699-a319-43e5-815a-4794cdec86c4.name: Engine Upgrade
6d937699-a319-43e5-815a-4794cdec86c4.text: Your action bar gains the action icon.

d962b363-45a8-4d1b-8c6f-6c94a7d65e9f.name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers
d962b363-45a8-4d1b-8c6f-6c94a7d65e9f.text:
Large Ship only.

After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a or result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.

1610f7fc-2f3a-47df-a119-c2050e7c6729.name: Targeting Computer
1610f7fc-2f3a-47df-a119-c2050e7c6729.text: Your action bar gains the action icon.

42957b9a-45aa-4375-8c3b-f7a2570afa42.name: Munitions Failsafe
42957b9a-45aa-4375-8c3b-f7a2570afa42.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

34800d64-4d8d-431e-92f8-fdf59fb4e618.name: Stygium Particle Accelerator
34800d64-4d8d-431e-92f8-fdf59fb4e618.text: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

bbcf3e41-5b11-44d6-a53c-ef5ece47e43c.name: Advanced Cloaking Device
bbcf3e41-5b11-44d6-a53c-ef5ece47e43c.text:
TIE Phantom only.

After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

c93da83e-0403-4dc1-9e96-e3baec7d9291.name: Combat Retrofit
c93da83e-0403-4dc1-9e96-e3baec7d9291.text:
GR-75 only.

Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.

7831c4bb-0287-4dc1-8467-19d644214162.name: B-Wing/E2
7831c4bb-0287-4dc1-8467-19d644214162.text:
B-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

ba185689-1bdf-4708-89f5-e5b6abc6cce2.name: Countermeasures
ba185689-1bdf-4708-89f5-e5b6abc6cce2.text:
Large Ship only.

At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

1185d2ef-49b2-4456-b3a4-96703e52bd13.name: Experimental Interface
1185d2ef-49b2-4456-b3a4-96703e52bd13.text: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.

7261d021-9943-414d-aff0-62d6ad179796.name: Tactical Jammer
7261d021-9943-414d-aff0-62d6ad179796.text:
Large Ship only.

Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.

f7b50254-01d2-4e5c-8391-726f23b3751c.name: Autothrusters
f7b50254-01d2-4e5c-8391-726f23b3751c.text: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to a result. You can equip this card only if you have the action icon.

92302965-8534-4b30-a8dd-2219a79bc164.name: Slave I
92302965-8534-4b30-a8dd-2219a79bc164.text:
Firespray-31 only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

86794efe-2ad7-4c39-9221-92e8293bc7f3.name: Millennium Falcon
86794efe-2ad7-4c39-9221-92e8293bc7f3.text:
YT-1300 only.

Your action bar gains the action icon.

d2aeeb88-8cfa-461e-9af8-457b8b235f7e.name: Moldy Crow
d2aeeb88-8cfa-461e-9af8-457b8b235f7e.text:
HWK-290 only.

During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

0c97d829-c357-4a4e-9ee3-60748053611f.name: ST-321
0c97d829-c357-4a4e-9ee3-60748053611f.text:
Lambda-class Shuttle only.

When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any enemy ship in the play area.

74e643e7-4bfb-4289-bd23-31148b507968.name: Royal Guard TIE
74e643e7-4bfb-4289-bd23-31148b507968.text:
TIE Interceptor only.

You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades (instead of 1).

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "4" or lower.

a315f35b-28cb-43ed-bab1-f593440fb9d4.name: Dodonna's Pride
a315f35b-28cb-43ed-bab1-f593440fb9d4.text:
CR90 fore section only.

When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

ac408d15-29dd-446f-bf04-b740ab3b36eb.name: A-Wing Test Pilot
ac408d15-29dd-446f-bf04-b740ab3b36eb.text:
A-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains 1 upgrade icon.

You cannot equip 2 of the same Upgrade cards. You cannot equip this if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

d679cee9-7b22-4bcf-9546-154454740b19.name: Tantive IV
d679cee9-7b22-4bcf-9546-154454740b19.text:
CR90 fore section only.

Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional and 1 additional upgrade icon.

91149cab-207e-42f9-bfc3-d8937b2004c1.name: Bright Hope
91149cab-207e-42f9-bfc3-d8937b2004c1.text:
GR-75 only.

A reinforce action assigned to your fore section adds 2 results (instead of 1).

2fd3fffb-57c9-44d1-b242-d7680dfecd59.name: Quantum Storm
2fd3fffb-57c9-44d1-b242-d7680dfecd59.text:
GR-75 only.

At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

ef99e93a-d44c-41fa-b900-b761bf802e94.name: Dutyfree
ef99e93a-d44c-41fa-b900-b761bf802e94.text:
GR-75 only.

When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-3 (instead of at Range 1-2).

f7c37a0a-d01f-4877-b174-0580b9e5ac85.name: Jaina's Light
f7c37a0a-d01f-4877-b174-0580b9e5ac85.text:
CR90 fore section only.

When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

d05b47d2-a19a-4eb4-9d12-44cd19717d23.name: Outrider
d05b47d2-a19a-4eb4-9d12-44cd19717d23.text:
YT-2400 only.

While you have a Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

d26630bc-576e-4e94-b1d1-fe98d15ea25c.name: Dauntless
d26630bc-576e-4e94-b1d1-fe98d15ea25c.text:
VT-49 Decimator only.

After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

ac20a73a-e2f7-4568-9e31-8f1a41994ed3.name: Virago
ac20a73a-e2f7-4568-9e31-8f1a41994ed3.text:
StarViper only.

Your upgrade bar gains the and upgrade icons.

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

618b2a04-3cd1-4886-9487-bf7f1cd9dc26.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Cannon)
618b2a04-3cd1-4886-9487-bf7f1cd9dc26.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

9243bae1-03ee-4f30-a638-f15b2b96e772.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Torpedo)
9243bae1-03ee-4f30-a638-f15b2b96e772.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

6330e225-9b93-4f62-991f-c1992d82c49f.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Missile)
6330e225-9b93-4f62-991f-c1992d82c49f.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

4bd0d094-70cc-48ee-b62a-f786387658b1.name: IG-2000
4bd0d094-70cc-48ee-b62a-f786387658b1.text:
Aggressor only.

You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

2221007a-11f3-4085-94b7-e607f56bd41b.name: BTL-A4 Y-Wing
2221007a-11f3-4085-94b7-e607f56bd41b.text:
Y-Wing only.

You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a secondary weapon.

ab562b63-4088-413a-8ea5-d2c4b24a1369.name: Andrasta
ab562b63-4088-413a-8ea5-d2c4b24a1369.text: Your upgrade bar gains two additional upgrade icons.

c66ef857-69fa-41da-959c-620e7bdf1366.name: TIE/x1
c66ef857-69fa-41da-959c-620e7bdf1366.text:
TIE Advanced only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

If you equip a upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).
